CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1958, page 2, reads: "Cracked Ceiling - The ceiling plaster in the kitchen of the 31 Gilmore Way dwelling, where Mr. and Mrs. Prentiss Parish and children are now living, is about ready to fall in several places. One of the defects can be seen about the window. In this room, the door is also splintered."
TitMainTitle: Condemned kitchen interior with severe damage to plaster walls and ceiling, stove with oven, pots, and tea kettle on left, window with light colored patterned curtains, table with light colored tablecloth and chair
